0.context: The Norwegian National Opera Ballet Suggested Read You Can Soon Enjoy 360 Degree Views Of Northern Lights From Svart Hotel In Norway The famous Opera House is designed in a way that it tricks people into believing it is rising from the water It organises its shows on three lavishly designed stages The Main House The Second House and the Studio Its majestic windows give pedestrians a glimpse of the fancy interiors making it one of the top Norway tourist attractions Location Kirsten Flagstands Pl 1 Oslo Timings 10 8 PM Europe Holiday Packages On TravelTriangle Explore the most beautiful places to visit in Europe from Paris to the Venice canals and from the Greek islands to the Swiss alps Book customized packages by expert agents on TravelTriangle Inclusive of airport transfers cab resort sightseeing and meals Best holiday experience Guaranteed Book Now Magnificent Switzerland Holiday Package Rs Plan your trip today Book Now Magnificent Europe Tour Package Rs Get quotes from multiple travel experts Book Now France Switzerland Tour Package Rs Compare customize quotes before booking Book Now Scintillating Spain Portugal Tour Rs Have Questions Talk to our travel experts today Book Now 6 Country Europe Tour Package Rs Best prices guaranteed EMI option available Book Now See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE COM Visit Website
0.summary: The Norwegian National Opera & Ballet in Oslo features three lavishly designed stages and majestic windows offering glimpses of its interiors. Location: Kirsten Flagstands Pl 1, Oslo. Timings: 10 AM to 8 PM.

1.context: Tusenfryd Amusement Park It is one of the foremost Norway attractions and most famous amusement park in the world It is home to more than 30 attractions such as SpeedMonster SuperSplash ThunderCoaster and SpaceShot During summers you can also enjoy the water park known as BadeFryd which has a pool a river for swimming and an exciting waterslide Location Winterbro Norway Timings 6 PM Entry fee INR 1700 Suggested Read Norway Buzzing Places To Set The Scene
1.summary: Tusenfryd Amusement Park, located in Winterbro, Norway, features over 30 attractions including SpeedMonster, SuperSplash, ThunderCoaster, and SpaceShot. Location: Winterbro, Norway. Timings: Until 6 PM. Entry fee: INR 1700.

2.context: Akershus Fortress Suggested Read 10 Things That Turn Norway Honeymoon Into A Dreamy Beginning For Any Couple This is a great addition to any Norway sightseeing tour especially for the history buffs This building was constructed in 1299 under the orders of King Hakon the Fifth and prevented the city from many sieges throughout the years Norway tours generally include a guided tour of this fortress that also plays host to a great many concerts and ceremonies Location Festningsplassen 1 Oslo 0015 Norway Timings AM 6 PM Places To Visit In Tromso Known for its splendid architecture reflected in the wooden houses Tromso is boasts of amazing fjords mountains museums and forests
2.summary: Akershus Fortress in Oslo, constructed in 1299 by King Hakon V, is a must-visit for history buffs. It has withstood many sieges and hosts concerts and ceremonies. Location: Festningsplassen 1, Oslo 0015, Norway. Timings: Until 6 PM.

3.context: Tromso University Museum This museum displays various interesting facts about the locals staying in Norway the Sami Tromso University Museum also exhibits the most famous Norway point of interest the Northern Lights It is one of those fascinating places to visit in Norway that should be on everyone s list Location Lars Thoringsvei 10 Tromso 9037 Norway Timings 10 AM PM Book Norway Tour Packages with TravelTriangle
3.summary: Tromso University Museum in Norway showcases local Sami culture and exhibits about the Northern Lights. Location: Lars Thoringsvei 10, Tromso 9037, Norway. Timings: From 10 AM.

4.context: Arctic Cathedral Suggested Read Cabin Vindehim In Norway Is A Divine Stay Peeking Out Of Tons Of Snow If you are thinking what to see in Norway then get to the Arctic Cathedral another one of the famous Norway attractions It is renowned for its striking architecture that is both modern and beautiful The enormous and majestic stained glass window reflects the resurrection of Jesus Christ and makes this church one of the best Norway tourist attractions Location Hans Nilsens veg 41 Tromsdalen Timings 1 6 PM Entry fee INR 423
4.summary: The Arctic Cathedral in Tromsdalen, Norway, is known for its modern architecture and majestic stained glass window depicting the resurrection of Jesus Christ. Location: Hans Nilsens veg 41, Tromsdalen. Timings: 1 PM to 6 PM. Entry fee: INR 423.

5.context: The Science Center of Northern Norway This houses the biggest Norwegian planetarium and gives visitors a chance to look at the Northern lights up and close Tourists also have the option to explore universal phenomenons on various topics related to climate environment and energy It features prominently in all lists of Norway places to visit Location Hansine Hansens veg 17 9019 Tromsø Timings 4 PM Entry fee INR 1017 Suggested Read 10 Classy Norway Hotels For The Best Views Of Fjords Snow The Northern Lights
5.summary: The Science Center of Northern Norway in Tromsø houses the largest Norwegian planetarium, offering close-up views of the Northern Lights and exhibits on climate, environment, and energy. Location: Hansine Hansens veg 17, 9019 Tromsø. Timings: Until 4 PM. Entry fee: INR 1017.

6.context: Tromsø Botanic Garden Suggested Read This Misty Road Along The Rapids In Odda Valley Norway Is Perfect For A Drive To Remember This garden houses a unique collection of the flora of Northern Norway and is one of the most interesting places to visit in Norway Flowering season starts in May and continues till October The most fascinating sights here are purple saxifrage and yellow cushion plants pasque flowers and a variety of flowering bulbs Location 9006 Tromsø Location 9006 Tromsø Norway Places To Visit In Bergen One of the busiest ports in Norway Bergen is covered by a range of hills known as the Seven Mountains It is the country s cultural hub hosting popular events like the Annual Bergen International Festival Nattjazz Festival and Bergenfest
6.summary: Tromsø Botanic Garden in Norway features a unique collection of Northern Norway's flora, with the flowering season from May to October. Location: 9006 Tromsø, Norway.

7.context: Colorful Bryggen Hanseatic Wharf It is one of the most famous Norway destinations The narrow streets and antique houses of wood numerous eateries studios and workshops are literally asking to be explored When you are there do not miss out on the interesting Bryggen Museum which has on display many artefacts from the 14th century Location Bryggen 5003 Bergen Norway Timings 9 AM 4PM Suggested Read Norway In February Is All About Stargazing Northern Lights Skiing On The Slopes
7.summary: Colorful Bryggen Hanseatic Wharf in Bergen, Norway, is famous for its narrow streets, antique wooden houses, eateries, studios, workshops, and the Bryggen Museum with artifacts from the 14th century. Location: Bryggen 5003, Bergen, Norway. Timings: 9 AM to 4 PM.

8.context: The Bergenhus Fortress Suggested Read This Sled Hotel In Finland Lets You Move Around For The Best Views Of Northern Lights This fascinating Scandinavian fortress dominates the entry to Bergens Harbor since the 16th century When here one must spend some time in the popular Bergenhus Fortress Museum that displays the contribution of women and many resistance groups during the German attacks Location Vågen 5003 Bergen Norway Timings 11 AM
8.summary: Bergenhus Fortress in Bergen, Norway, has dominated Bergen Harbor since the 16th century and features a museum highlighting women's contributions and resistance groups during German attacks. Location: Vågen 5003, Bergen, Norway. Timings: From 11 AM.

9.context: Bergen s Royal Residence The Hakon Hall was constructed for King Hakon Hakonsson in the 13th century Built next to the Rosenkrantz tower this exquisite structure has been extended many times as a reflection of their power and fortification Location Gamlehaugvegen 10 5230 Paradis Further Read 10 Romantic Things To Do In Norway For Couples A vacation to Norway is nothing short of a 9.summary: The Hakon Hall in Bergen was constructed for King Hakon Hakonsson in the 13th century and has been extended over time. Location: Gamlehaugvegen 10, 5230 Paradis.
